font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 细微的，不重要的： lacking in significance or solid worth
【例】 Deciding what you want to do for a living is no trifling matter. 决定维持生计的行当可不是一件小事。‖trifling differences between the theatrical and DVD versions of the movie 影院版和 DVD版电影当中的细微区别
【近】 frivolous, inconsequential, inconsiderable, insignificant, minor, minute, negligible, nugatory, slight, trivial
【反】 consequential, eventful, important, meaningful, momentous, significant, substantial, weighty 重要的
